lead_paragraph: Southampton manager Ronald Koeman is bracing for a revenge-minded Arsenal side when the Saints visit the Emirates Stadium for a Premier League clash on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Saints Expect Arsenal to Come Out With All Guns Blazing
headline.main: Saints Expect Arsenal to Come Out With All Guns Blazing

snippet: Southampton manager Ronald Koeman is bracing for a revenge-minded Arsenal side when the Saints visit the Emirates Stadium for a Premier League clash on Tuesday....
